actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide that persons who cultivate certain uncultivated land susceptible to excessive soil erosion in a manner which fails to prevent such erosion may not receive certain Federal assistance with respect to such land or agricultural commodities grown on such land, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Erosion Reduction Act of 1982 - Makes persons who cultivate erosion-susceptible land in a manner which does not prevent such erosion ineligible for specified agricultural payments and loans.

titles.title: A bill to provide that persons who cultivate certain uncultivated land susceptible to excessive soil erosion in a manner which fails to prevent such erosion may not receive certain Federal assistance with respect to such land or agricultural commodities grown on such land, and for other purposes.
